title: List of New Zealand heavyweight boxing champions
text: This list of New Zealand heavyweight boxing champions is a table showing the boxers who have won the New Zealand professional <a href="heavyweight">heavyweight</a> championship. The title has been administered by the New Zealand Boxing Association, New Zealand National Boxing Federation, Pro Box NZ, New Zealand Professional Boxing Commission and <a href="New%20Zealand%20Professional%20Boxing%20Association">New Zealand Professional Boxing Association</a> since 1885. A champion will often voluntarily relinquish the title in order to fight for a higher-ranked championship, such as a world title. Where the date on which a champion relinquished the title is unclear.
